main event: An observer reported seeing a dim, round light moving intermittently in Gammon, Colorado, on February 17, 1967.
interesting points: The observer described the object as appearing more like a yellow spot of light than a defined shape., The object was observed for approximately ten minutes with occasional blinking., The sighting occurred while the observer was driving and was seen through the front windshield., There was corroboration from the observer's wife who was in the same vehicle., Movement included side-to-side rocking and a gradual climb before it moved away.
sighted object: a dim yellow spot of light
